title: [Question]Tell me your experience

            and also doesn't look as good as nb
Are pg's better option than hostel, if I buy mess membership in campus

Listen man, I’ve been living outside the hostel for three years, and unless you have a lot of money, I’d strongly recommend choosing the hostel. Here’s why:

* **Laundry is included.** Trust me, this will save a lot of your time.
* **Food is close by** (you might not always like it, but it’s convenient).
* **Better environment.** Around PES, most rooms rented out to students are terrible. I’ve stayed in four different places (yes, I’ve moved four times), and it’s honestly been the worst experience — especially if your roommates are annoying or try to peer-pressure you.
* **Space.** Some people say hostel rooms are cramped. I’ve seen them, brother — they’re not. They’re actually decent enough to live in comfortably.
* **Saves time.** Hostel life saves you a lot of time, because all the little chores that people living outside have to handle are already taken care of.

I really wish I had chosen the hostel in my first year itself.

And whatever you do, don’t even think about commuting from anywhere farther than Vijayanagar.
